servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P2102: Throttle Actuator Control Motor Circuit Low

entry.ptxt: Monitor voltage of throttle motor power supply circuit is lower than 5 V even if throttle motor control relay is ON (ignition switch is ON).

item.ptxt: Throttle motor control relay and/or its circuit

ptxt.emph: P2103: Throttle Actuator Control Motor Circuit High

entry.ptxt: Output voltage of throttle motor power supply circuit is higher than 5 V even if throttle motor control relay is OFF (ignition switch is OFF).

item.ptxt: Throttle motor control relay and/or its circuit

s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position for 10 sec.
Turn OFF ignition switch for 10 sec.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:J24B .

testgroup.title: Throttle motor control relay circuit check
testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: Throttle motor control relay power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and remove throttle motor control relay.
Check for proper terminal connection to throttle motor control relay connector.
If connections are OK, check that voltage between throttle motor control relay power supply circuit (A1 – A2) and vehicle body ground is battery voltage.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Replace or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: Throttle motor control relay drive circuit and throttle motor power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and disconnect connectors from ECM.
Check that throttle motor control relay drive circuit (A3) and throttle motor power supply circuit (A4) are as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of throttle motor control relay drive circuit and throttle motor power supply circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance between throttle motor control relay drive circuit and throttle motor power supply circuit and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between throttle motor control relay drive circuit terminal and each terminal at throttle motor control relay connector.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between throttle motor power supply circuit terminal and each terminal at throttle motor control relay connector.
Circuit voltage of throttle motor control relay drive circuit and throttle motor power supply circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch in ON position.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:J24B .

testgroup.title: Throttle motor power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check that throttle motor power supply circuit (A4) is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned OFF.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
Repair or replace defective wire harness.
